message.body: Hey peco coming friday noon to 4... will you be home at noon?
Also can you do french sunday mornings instead? 10:00?
I have work at 2 and have to leave around 1:15
Ok Steph will have to reschedule it then. No worries

And ok cool I was worried that you would prefer evenings.... but yea he thinks he Is slick trying to tell me he has another teacher training him so he don't need you all bec he don't want to do sunday night studying
Dawn me and Steph were like yea right to the having someone else teaching him. We know he Is lying but this Is my convo with him (2 screenshots....)
Okay that sucks. Im used to tutoring people who like French. It's hard when you feel like you're forcing it on someone. He didn't even choose it over other languages. He had to do it
And yeah morning is much better. I had to leave Edens to do it and I'd rather not do that at night.
Right... but I'm going to work on it all week with him. I don't mind forcing It on him lol.
But hopefully repetition with help him and he will get better... he isn't that bright but he isn't an idiot. Just lazy and unmOtivated
